trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE1_00933_GEROLT_000_000<tab>Time to take me demiatma-imbued tools and direct the isle's aether into somethin' truly majestic!

TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE1_00933_GEROLT_000_001<tab>A sight o' the likes you've never seen before, eh? A shimmerin', shiftin', multi-layered mesh of aether made malleable, channeled with expert precision...
TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE1_00933_GEROLT_000_003<tab>Behold the pinnacle o' weapon an' shield fabrication: <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> an' <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>!

TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE1_00933_GEROLT_000_004<tab>To marvel at its glory is all well an' good, but the power within's naught but an illusory whisper─a fleetin' phantom, if ye will─until it's awoken in the throes o' battle.
TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE1_00933_GEROLT_000_005<tab>All of which is to say, get out there an' wield the bleedin' thing!
